languages.text: "Нет сомнений, что в это опасное путешествие отправятся самые рьяные сторонники кардинала, желающие его канонизации. Пожалуй, это снизит возможные волнения, которым подвержены экзальтированные верующие".

"It will doubtless be the cardinal's most passionate adherents who follow him on that perilous journey, wishing to see him sainted. I suppose that would minimise the potential unrest that ecstatically fervent believers are prone to."
languages.original_text: "Нет сомнений, что в это опасное путешествие отправятся самые рьяные сторонники кардинала, желающие его канонизации. Пожалуй, это снизит возможные волнения, которым подвержены экзальтированные верующие".

traits.locale_text: "It will doubtless be the cardinal's most passionate adherents who will follow him on that perilous journey, wishing to see him sainted. I suppose that would minimise the potential unrest that ecstatically fervent believers are prone to."

"It will doubtless be the cardinal's most passionate adherents who follow him on that perilous journey, wishing to see him sainted. I suppose that would minimise the potential unrest that ecstatically fervent believers are prone to."

languages.text: "Zweifellos werden seine leidenschaftlichsten Anhänger den Kardinal auf diese gefährliche Reise begleiten, um Zeugen seiner Heiligsprechung zu werden. Ich denke, das würde die möglichen Unruhen minimieren, zu denen fanatische Gläubige neigen."
languages.original_text: "It will doubtless be the cardinal's most passionate adherents who follow him on that perilous journey, wishing to see him sainted. I suppose that would minimise the potential unrest that ecstatically fervent believers are prone to."

traits.locale_text: "Zweifellos werden seine leidenschaftlichsten Anhänger den Kardinal auf diese gefährliche Reise begleiten, um Zeugen seiner Heiligsprechung zu werden. Ich denke, das würde die möglichen Unruhen minimieren, zu denen fanatische Gläubige neigen."

languages.text: « Nul doute que seuls les plus fervents disciples du cardinal le suivront dans ce voyage ô combien périlleux dans l'espoir de le voir canonisé, ce qui devrait minimiser le risque d'émeutes et autres troubles dont ces illuminés sont coutumiers. »
languages.original_text: "It will doubtless be the cardinal's most passionate adherents who follow him on that perilous journey, wishing to see him sainted. I suppose that would minimise the potential unrest that ecstatically fervent believers are prone to."

traits.locale_text: « Nul doute que seuls les plus fervents disciples du cardinal le suivront dans ce voyage ô combien périlleux dans l'espoir de le voir canonisé, ce qui devrait minimiser le risque d'émeutes et autres troubles dont ces illuminés sont coutumiers. »

languages.text: “毫无疑问，主教大人身边最狂热的信徒会与他同行，踏上这段危机四伏的旅程。他们渴望亲眼看到他被册封为圣人。我猜测，这可以在最大限度内减轻那些狂热信徒可能带来的动荡。”
languages.original_text: "It will doubtless be the cardinal's most passionate adherents who follow him on that perilous journey, wishing to see him sainted. I suppose that would minimise the potential unrest that ecstatically fervent believers are prone to."

traits.locale_text: “毫无疑问，主教大人身边最狂热的信徒会与他同行，踏上这段危机四伏的旅程。他们渴望亲眼看到他被册封为圣人。我猜测，这可以在最大限度内减轻那些狂热信徒可能带来的动荡。”

languages.text: «Sin duda, los seguidores más apasionados del cardenal le acompañarán en un viaje tan peligroso, dado su deseo de que quede canonizado. Supongo que eso minimizará los posibles problemas que suelen ocasionar los creyentes más devotos».
languages.original_text: "It will doubtless be the cardinal's most passionate adherents who follow him on that perilous journey, wishing to see him sainted. I suppose that would minimise the potential unrest that ecstatically fervent believers are prone to."

traits.locale_text: «Sin duda, los seguidores más apasionados del cardenal le acompañarán en un viaje tan peligroso, dado su deseo de que quede canonizado. Supongo que eso minimizará los posibles problemas que suelen ocasionar los creyentes más devotos».

languages.text: 「その危険な旅路に枢機卿を追いやるのは間違いなく、彼を聖人にしたいと願う最も熱烈な支持者たちでしょう。それによって、熱狂的な信者たちが起こしがちな潜在的な騒乱が最小限に抑えられると思います」
languages.original_text: "It will doubtless be the cardinal's most passionate adherents who follow him on that perilous journey, wishing to see him sainted. I suppose that would minimise the potential unrest that ecstatically fervent believers are prone to."

traits.locale_text: 「その危険な旅路に枢機卿を追いやるのは間違いなく、彼を聖人にしたいと願う最も熱烈な支持者たちでしょう。それによって、熱狂的な信者たちが起こしがちな潜在的な騒乱が最小限に抑えられると思います」

languages.text: "En tutkulu taraftarlarının da bu çileli yolda ona eşlik edip azizliğine tanık olmak isteyeceğinden şüphem yok. Aşırı inançlılarca meydana getirilebilecek kaos ortamının da bu vesileyle bir hayli dizginleneceğini sanıyorum."
languages.original_text: "It will doubtless be the cardinal's most passionate adherents who follow him on that perilous journey, wishing to see him sainted. I suppose that would minimise the potential unrest that ecstatically fervent believers are prone to."

traits.locale_text: "En tutkulu taraftarlarının da bu çileli yolda ona eşlik edip azizliğine tanık olmak isteyeceğinden şüphem yok. Aşırı inançlılarca meydana getirilebilecek kaos ortamının da bu vesileyle bir hayli dizginleneceğini sanıyorum."
